main event: Two brightly colored objects were observed in the sky near Ft. McMurray, Alberta, Canada on April 29, 1959.
interesting points: The objects were bright orange and silver with a pulsating light and made no sound., The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes., The objects were approximately 3 inches in diameter when viewed at arm's length., The witness was a civilian resident and has a background in aviation., The investigation could not establish the identity or origin of the objects.
witness description: A postmaster and local businessman, a former pilot, along with a chartered accountant, the town constable, and several other citizens.
